Summary: Perfect Triangle formation of Stars (one orange)
divs: sighting detailsat my job break during the middle of the night, i went outside of the buisness wharehouse. there's was a perfect triangle formation of very bright stars, one very strange orange star at the top of the triangle. i didn't know if it was only stars or something else. i walked in the parking and the formation followed me upward, backward, sideways. then i went behind the garage and a star followed me behind the garage, and followed me when i came back in the front of the garage. i suggest... to go outside in the middle of the night, because there's a lot those type of sightings. by the way, fox reported those type of light in the sky near of lake erie, ohio, cleveland. fox news: nightly ufo sightings over lake erie http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=04vgpa6bs2i&translated=1 ps : thanks to everyone who post report online.. we are the ufo news!! thank you, bless you! pps : the only thing we have to fear, is fear itself! ppps: watch ''close encounter of the third kind'' it's also a documentary
